mapper.select: SELECT plan_id, transport_order, transport_type, departure_station_code, arrival_station_code, departure_time, arrival_time, price, reservation_url, is_selected, created_at FROM plan_transports WHERE plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY departure_time, transport_order
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(transport_order), 0) FROM plan_transports WHERE plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_transports (plan_id, transport_order, transport_type, departure_station_code, arrival_station_code, departure_time, arrival_time, price, reservation_url, is_selected, created_at) VALUES (#{planId}, #{transportOrder}, #{transportType}, #{departureStationCode}, #{arrivalStationCode}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime}, #{price}, #{reservationUrl}, #{isSelected}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM plan_transports WHERE plan_id = #{planId} AND transport_order = #{transportOrder}
